verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> is everyone יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> [is] every one that feareth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God הַ֝הֹלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that walketh בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃ <S%H1870><s%> in his ways

יְגִ֣יעַ <S%H3018><s%> the labour כַּ֭פֶּיךָ <S%H3709><s%> of thine hands כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תֹאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> For thou shalt eat אַ֝שְׁרֶ֗יךָ <S%H835><s%> happy וְט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [shalt] thou [be] and [it shall be] well לָֽךְ׃

אֶשְׁתְּךָ֤ ׀ <S%H802><s%> Thy wife כְּגֶ֥פֶן <S%H1612><s%> vine פֹּרִיָּה֮ <S%H6509><s%> [shall be] as a fruitful בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֪י <S%H3411><s%> by the sides בֵ֫יתֶ֥ךָ <S%H1004><s%> of thine house בָּ֭נֶיךָ <S%H1121><s%> thy children כִּשְׁתִלֵ֣י <S%H8363><s%> plants זֵיתִ֑ים <S%H2132><s%> like olive סָ֝בִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְשֻׁלְחָנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7979><s%> thy table

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כִי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֵ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> thus יְבֹ֥רַךְ <S%H1288><s%> be blessed גָּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> Behold that thus shall the man יְרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> that feareth יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִצִּ֫יּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> thee out of Zion וּ֭רְאֵה <S%H7200><s%> and thou shalt see בְּט֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> the good יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life

וּרְאֵֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> Yea thou shalt see בָנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> thy children's לְבָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> children שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [and] peace עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> upon Israel
